main.name: A S M Salahuddin
main.description: A self-motivated IT professional with strong proficiency in ReactJS, JavaScript, Tailwind, Bootstrap, CSS3, HTML5, and especially mobile responsive web development alongside the ability in writing DRY and efficient code.
main.bio: As a Full Stack Developer, I create successful responsive websites that are fast, easy to use, and built with best practices. The main area of my expertise is HTML5, CSS3, Bootstrap, Tailwind CSS, JS, & ReactJS building small and medium web apps and coding interactive layouts. For some projects, I used MongoDB & Node.js for backend database collection.
